content.detailedDescription:
I saw this on oct. 16, at about 3-3:30 am. i had gotten out of bed because i could not sleep, i always look out of my bedroom window when i get up... a habit. i saw, in the distance, above the tree line,a very bright and  for lack of a better description, twinkling light.

it was a moon-bright night, and stars were out. i noticed this "star" because of its extreme brightness and i didn't remember seeing a star in that sky position before.
i first did think it was just a star but it was too different..
i got my small binoculars and looked at it.I steadied my hand on the window pane. this thing was a good distance from me and it didn't seem to move. 
when i steadied my hand, looked through the binoculars and i could get the best look at it. it had lights that were rapidly moving and i did notice that there were reddish lights and also what looked like fainter greenish lights. the object didn't move from location the whole time i watched it.
i looked at it for at least 10 minutes. 
i know it wasn't a plane, i see many planes day and night here, and it was not a plane.
the movement of the lights are hard to describe. they were so fast and constantly moving on or around the object. i could not get a photo has i have a small digital camera and the object was too far from me, it would have looked like a white blur.
it was fascinating. it wasn't high in the sky or far far away but enough that i couldn't see the colored lights except through the binoculars.
so after watchig it not move away i went back to bed at about 4:30 am.

i am up again very early, and i thought i would check to see if my "star" was still in positon. there is nothing there, where i saw it. the other stars are all viewable tonight and the moon is bright again. it is a true mystery to me what it was. i would like to say it was a ufo, but i don't know. i have never seen anything like it before. i would appreciate your take on this event and your feedback.. still looking skyward... thanks for listening.
content.summary: Extreme bright light, saw colored lights, rapid light movement

content.detailedDescription: At dusk, spotted while grilling, floating basketball shaped object, illuminated as if by flame, meandered across the sky until out of sight over period of 4-5 minutes.
content.summary: Floating, flickering object

content.detailedDescription:
At 7:30pm i let the dog out and was out on my deck.  i typically observe the night skies with both binoculars and night vision cameras. i was looking at jupitor tonight as its moons were clearly visible through the bino's.  i turn and noticed a very bright star that was completely out of place for its position in the sky.  i noticed it also twinkling very brightly.  i have a pair of canon 18x56 gyro binos, so i found the star in the lens and locked onto it.  after focusing i was completely blown away by what i saw.  very very clear flashing lights, blue green, red, yellow, white in a bar like pattern.  i pulled away the binos and looked at it thinking it had to be moving, but it didn't it just stay'd in its position in the sky.  the structure of the craft is best described as a cone with a pointed top.  the lights display complete randomness to spining like they were racing around the craft.   

this was a fist of this kind for me.  i went to my nieghbors house and show'd him the object and he was dumbfounded also.  the craft was in the western sky from morris.  there was lots of aircraft up tonight but none seemed attracted to this craft.  my nieghbor and i watched it for at least a half hour.  i could not get my camera to peer through the 18x scope.  just with the naked eye takes time to find a object with that kind of power. 

i went back to my house and watched it for a while longer.  i went into the house and came back out a while later and the object was gone.

i dont know how high it was or the size but looking through the binos you could absolutely make out that it had a cone structure with a pointed top.
content.summary: Notice a twinkling star that was out of place

content.detailedDescription:
Thursday oct. 9th, 2011, 9 p.M.:

as i traveled home from a house 1.5miles away from mine, i began to notice what at first seemed to be a new light installed by the new song baptist church at the end of ashwood dr., but soon came to realize it was a craft! this craft has 3 bight lights on the bottom portion, it was triangular in shape, was moving slowly and also maintaining a low flight path. the lights on the craft were so bright, not only did they illuminate the ground below the craft (i'd say the craft was about 25-35 ft. above the ground)but they also blinded me temporarily as if i had stared directly at the sun for a few seconds. this caused me to swerve across the road and almost into the ditch, at this time i stopped my car fumbling for my phone to take a picture, but the craft rotated, much like how a helicopter lowers its nose so that the piolt could look towards the ground ahead of the craft. i felt cold and light headed, mostly from nervousness because this craft obviously was searching for something, after "looking at me" for a few seconds the craft moved above my vechile, in fear i sped off towards my house which was about 300ft away, when i got there (in a matter of seconds) i looked back in the sky towards where the craft should have been, it was gone. i do have an airport south west of my house in mt. pleasant, but this craft was headed north west, and flying very low, there is no way it could have escaped my sight in the few seconds it took for me to get home. i have no clue what the craft wanted, or what or who it was looking for, but i've never seen activity like this in my area. i always see the ufo stories that make the tv and all of them are out west, i always wanted to see a ufo and now that i have it almost puts me in fear to really know for sure that something more intelligent than any human does exist, what possibly could they be wanting with columbia, and mt. pleasant? is it because the end is near, and they are returning to attempt to find the civilizations they left long ago? what sort of intentions do they have, and why haven't they landed and made direct face to face contact with us yet, why do they just fly searching the ground?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangular craft, blinds and nearly causes a wreck.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from kansas city to lawrence, kansas on highway k-10, heading west near de soto. i spotted a craft with a series of lights blinking in sequence. the craft appeared to be hovering.  i pointed it out to the other passengers in the car and noted that it appeared to be similar to the reports we've read of sightings over lee's summit, missouri. as we neared the de soto exit, the craft seemed to be moving slowly overhead, moving in a northwest to southeastern direction. if i had to guess, i would say it was several hundred feet up, but it was difficult to gauge size and distance. as we crossed the path of the craft, my wife looked up at it and described it as "triangular." i noted the time to be 8:13.
content.summary: Craft sighted with multiple lights blinking sequentially, hovering or moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling back from ontonagon michigan and decided to stop at the park to go to the bathroom, i ended up taking a picture of the bridge and water . it was about a week later and i was going to send it to a friend a
nd i  noticed that there is object in the picture. i showed it to some friends and even sent it to a news agency to see if their engineers could bring the object into view.
content.summary: I was taking this pic of the bridge/water and never noticed anything nor heard it. i looked at the pic about a week later and noticed something strange, i did send a copy to the local news to see if they could clean it up. not sure what it is

content.detailedDescription:
Please read the description on picture i drew. my memory is very strange right now and the memory is not as clear & getting fainter, my daughter is dealing with the same issue. i think i am still very much in shock. also you can view my facebook @ [link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]]. i responded with clearer memory. 
i was in hwy 26 in hillsboro oregon just north of the intel site.
i first noticed it before the jackson school rd over pass as a bright light ahead of me.
i first thought it was a plane with its headlights on coming straight at me.
its started as a point of bright light about 5 miles ahead of me. i woke my daughter who was sleeping in the back seat to come sit in passenger side seat and view what i was seeing. i slowed the van as i drove along with at least 4 other cars that were on the hwy and was looking at it. it then zipped off to the right and was over my town of north plains, then its zipped  to my right on the north side of hwy 26 and started to slowly cruise over the freeway in front of us about 50 yards in front of us heading to the southeast. it only had a unbelievable white light coming out the bottom. once across the freeway it stopped and hovered over the open field to the left of the freeway it then turned on red lights that glided side to side on the far-side of it and green lights gliding side to side on the near side of it. they were gliding separately in opposite directions of each other with the white glow still present. it was at times easy to see the shape of a long rectangle with a triangle front and at times it was hard to see the shape at all. it was dark grey and not shinny at all and made no noise! 
 i was so focused on trying figure out what i was seeing, looking for wings, looking for lights, looking for windows, anything that would have told my brain it was just a weird airplane. but, when i didn't see anything i knew was normal i started stressing and trying to explain to myself what my daughter & i were seeing. 
then we passed the tree line and i knew i had to turn around and try to see it better. so we turned back around on glencoe rd and headed back and that only took less then 2 min if that and it was completely gone! something that big should have still been in the skyline or something! last thing i was thinking was clicking pictures or stopping. i wish now i had now!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My daughter and i were driving and it crossed in from of us over the freeway then hovered.

content.detailedDescription: On october 15th 2011, just past 11pm mountain time in thornton, colorado, i was letting my two dogs out in the back yard.  i looked up in the sky to the north direction and saw what may have been a ufo or at least some type of unknown aircraft.   it was flying quite low and must have been less than a mile or at max two miles away.   it was flying in an easterly direction.   it was a very dull gray and almost transparent craft.   it was in the shape of a large v, with what seemed to look like 5 very dull gray rather large lights on it. i witnessed it flying and called out to my husband and he didn't take me seriously until he came over and saw it flying soundlessly, rather cruising along slowly before it disappeared, our view now being blocked by my house.   after he acknowledged seeing it he thought that maybe it was some kind of new stealth fighter being tested. but we found it weird that they would fly so low in a well populated area and not make a sound as well.   we looked all over the internet and could not find any pictures, ufo or man crafted of this v shaped ship.   then we found a report describing the exact ship yesterday in illinois. reading that someone else had seen the ship kind of freaked us out.  this compelled us to write a report as well.
content.summary: Dull grey v shaped semi transparent craft flying low in thornton colorado oct. 15th 2011

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside on to the deck to take a look at the stars. noticed one "star" that looked particularly bright, when it started moving slowly from the sw to the ne. object was shining brightly almost glittering. watched it for about 20-30 seconds and then went to the sliding door and called my wife and children to come see it. my wife came out and i pointed the object out to her, at no time did either of us hear any noise. we both watched it for around 10-15 seconds when the object started dimming, seemed to turn a dull red, and then completely faded out. my wife went back inside and i stayed out because i had noticed planes in the sky and wanted to see if any of them would come to the are where i last saw the object. a plane did fly, heading from e to w (from detroit metro airport), close to where the object had been. i could definitely hear the plane as it passed. as the object was flying slowly it seemed to almost be vibrating as it moved along the flight path. i noticed that all the planes i could see had blinking navigation lights on them, the object was like a point of light, glimmering, vibrating, i noticed there were no navigation lights on it. as i was watching it with my wife i pointed out to her that there were no navigation lights on the object and then pointed to a plane in the distance to show that it had navigation lights on it. this is the second time i have witnessed an object like this.
content.summary: Starlike object, no sound, glittering, turned red before fading, slow movement

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting on our deck outside while talking about planes and their crusing altitude when we noticed the brightest light in the night sky overpowering all other extraterrestrial bodies. it was moving parallel to the milky way in a easterly direction. it travelled quickly but at a steady rate. we thought it was strange it was so bright and not blinking nor had a red light like all planes do. there was no sound emitted. we watched it for almost a minute before it dimmed then rapidly acended in an exponential curve outward as it completely disappeared into nothing, and we could no longer see it.  we both just stood in amazement immediately confirming the details of the event to each other. we were excited that we had both witnessed together our second ufo event.
content.summary: Brightest light in sky traveling straight path at steady rate. went parabolic while simultaneously dimming before completely disappearing into thin air. brightest light went out. weird!

content.detailedDescription:
It was 4am and i went outside on my deck with my dogs as i had gotten up at this time because my husband was leaving on a business trip

i noticed a flying object in the sky moving west.  not in the "normal" directions that planes fly over our house. at first i thought thats a plane, but why is it flying that way?

i turned around walked about 5 paces and continued looking up at the sky at the orion constellation; about 20 seconds passed

i walked back to my original place, looked up and the object was in the same place.

the object had white, yellow, red and blue lights, not all flashing at the same time, however the white one was consistent.  it stayed in the same location for about 2 minutes before very slowly moving west.

i was mesmorized, frightened and curious.  i couldn't stop watching it wondering why i could not hear sound and why it wasn't moving. the white light got brighter at times; it made me feel as though it knew i was there.  it took about 10 minutes for the object to move out of site; which was not very far.  there is no reason it should have taken that long to travel the distance it did. i could not tell where it went as the house next door blocked the view.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering craft with blinking lights that tired to look like a plane

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to take the dog potty. my son and i always look at the stars. we both saw this bright light moving form south to north. my son had noticed it first. he asked me why the star was so bright. it got my attention to say the least. we watched it move from close to the border north. at first i thought it might be a uav from ft. huachuaca. we see quite a bite of those at night around here. it was not a uav. after it got parallel with us it took an abrupt turn to the nw and was gone with crazy fast speed. 
i spent 8yrs in the army, and did 2 tours in iraq. i have seen fighters in flight many times. i have never seen anything move that fast.
thank you for your time.
content.summary: Bright light moving from south to north.

content.detailedDescription: My home sets second tier to a lake. my girlfriend and i were hosting my daughters sweet sixteen party and i had gone to the deck to smoke a cigarette. having seen that same veiw many times west over the lake it caught my attention immediatley. it appeared as a distant light much brighter than the stars and it was a completely clear night.It was still at first. then it began moving east. i told another adult to come look at this light that was coming over top of us. my girlfriend came out as well. we all three observed this light with no strobes or colors and most oddly no noise at all. it moved directly overhead, got dimmer for 10 seconds then just blinked out like a light being shut off. i commented to the other adult that i had seen simular events in the last couple of years and had heard accounts from well reputable individuals describing events like this but even more detailed and closer observations but refuse to report them. myself, i have wittnessed lots of things in the night sky i could not explain so i felt happy that i had wittnesses to what i knew i was seeing. the other two wittnesses could only look at me and say"what the hell was that". it wasn't making any noise or flashing lights".
content.summary: Saw a brighter than usual star in the west . was stationary then moved directly over myself and two other wittnesses .Then went dim to yellow  . then just went out .

content.detailedDescription: Nm albuquerque, saturday oct. 15th at 11:45 pm, stepped out to my balcony for a smoke before heading to bed. every night i watch the sky's. as i looked to the south i noticed a stream of star like objects flashing red, blue and what seemed to be yellow and or green. they were coming in a jagged formation from the north west heading in a south east direction. they then turned east toward orions belt and slowly despairing. my first thought was they were ufo visitors. i ran back in to get my two oldest kids and husband to witness this exciting event. while watching i called my sister in albuquerque and 2 friends in rio rancho to come out side to see this. after it was over i searched the internet to see of any other similar postings were made. one other in my city i did find. today the only news postings were on a meteor. we did witness what seemed like it could be a meteor after they (star like objects) flew through then fallowed by one plane about 5 to 10 minutes later. by 12:30 pm i did one more search over the sky's to see if there were any more activity before heading to bed. researching the news sunday morning the only listings i found was one possible meteor coming through. these meany many (over 40) objects were not meteors. they moved as if coming into a formation and made a deliberate turn. meteors do not move in this manner.
content.summary: Several star like lights moving n to s then east

content.detailedDescription: Wasnt sure to report until i read a report from last night of what sounds like the same object i witnessed exactly two weeks ago from their sighting traveling roughly the same area. i was on a local bike/jogging trail on   october first getting in some much needed excersise. it was begining to get dark so i headed back toward the parking lot to pack up and go. i unlocked the car opened the door and stood for a second taking a drink of water and i saw a very large low flying object with stadium type looking lights on the front. it wasnt yet completely dark outside but getting close. the object seemed to be dark in color but the lights on the front were so bright i couldnt really see the objects features but appeared to be boomerang in shape. the lights seemed to be almost stacked on top of each other as well as side to side on the front. once again, they looked like lights you see in a football stadium, extremely bright, lighting up the path in front of it for quite a distance.They were bright white in color. i did not observe any other lights on the object, such as the strobes you would see on the wings of an aircraft. the object appeared to be boomerang shaped. it glided almost directly overhead as i stood there getting goosebumps. i felt an almost euphoric feeling as it glided overhead. i heard the sound of what sounded like jet aircraft but it did not seem to be coming from the object i am describing as it would have been much louder at this close of a distance. the object was traveling north and as it got further away, and the lights werent obstructing my view it appeared to be black. could not make out any other features other then its black or dark color and boomerang type shape.
content.summary: Just finished riding the trail, getting gear packed in car and a large very slow moving craft came almost straight overhead.Stadium like lights on front of object.

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i were in the car going down a somewhat busy street on a friday night. i am always looking at the sky in hopes of seeing a ufo. well i always end up seeing weird lights, and immediately classify those lights as jets/planes/stars/satellites. well friday night we were cruising down the road and i notice a star. i take a quick look at it, and see the bright starlight shutoff, and then the light came back on. as if it was pulsating or blinking. as we come to a stop, i realize it is moving pretty fast across the sky. i try to keep watch and tell my dad to pullover, he is not interested so we keep driving. i try to keep watch as trees and buildings pass by, but i lose sight of it. i finally convince him to pullover at a baseball field, as we turn down the street we come up to a round a bout. as we are circling the round about i see 1 star in the sky. within about 2 seconds, i see that 1 star split into 2 stars and the second star descended rapidly, then ascended and came back together with the original star. then once again it split into 2 stars and the bottom star descended and disappeared. so i told my dad to rush to the field, i get out of the car and quickly run out to observe the sky. i see nothing but stars and airplanes. i know i saw something, its just the timing was off. we didnt get to the field fast enough. as far as im concerned we never have ufo sightings in raleigh.
content.summary: 2 sightings within 5 minutes- starlike

content.detailedDescription: Went south to the north, really quick, first 3 objects, one smaller than the other two, went by right in front of me, basically twice as high a single layer home, that is what i seen it over, boom they were gone, in the next 20 minutes seen two in the same pattern. help me here would ya?  i don't believe in this ****.
content.summary: Looked like papet plates gong at a very great speed. not much higher than 4 story building. much lower i think. im a skeptical. please, someone tell me i'm not crazy

content.detailedDescription:
15 oct 2011: i am getting very hesitant to report more of these sightings since it often seems that we are the only ones seeing these unidentified craft in our metro area.  however, there were two other boomerang objects reported for nebraska in september and another seen in iowa last night as well.  so after my girlfriend observed this one, i felt it was important to document for ���the record���.

at approx 11pm, she had stepped out on the small deck of an apartment on the 2nd floor of a 3-floor building in the area of 74th and maple streets.  while glancing up to her left (east) she observed a boomerang or triangle shaped craft gliding in an open area of the sky between some tree branches and the roof of the apartment building.  total viewing time was 2-3 seconds, but she was dumbfounded by how low it was without any sound or other normal nav lights or strobes.  she states that it had seven white lights with one at the point and then three on each side equally spaced.  she lost sight of it when it passed over the roof of the apartment building.

there is nothing scientific to study here.  no photos/video or any other physical evidence.  i guess you can have someone contact us, but there really isn���t much to follow up on.  we simply want it known that we are still witnessing these anomalous craft in the omaha area.  suffice to say, there are many possible scenarios about what these objects might be.  i have been reading some information online that is quite unscientific from ���channeled��� entities.  having researched this subject myself with a great deal of interest since december 2008, i have to say this channeled info seems quite far-fetched, yet it really makes sense on many levels.  i guess things are to really gain momentum for disclosure in the next few months.  there is a petition to sign on whitehouse.Org as well.
content.summary: Boomerang craft with 6-7 white lights

content.detailedDescription: Me and 3 friends had stepped outside to smoke a cigarette and see one of us off for the night. as we were outside, i happened to look up and saw a bright red/orange object silently drift overhead from an apparent nw to se direction. my first thought was that the object cannot be a plane, and it did not look like any satellite i had ever seen; it was larger and brighter than a satellite (and also not white like all satellites i have seen to date). we were standing in my friend's driveway between the house and external garage and had to run into the backyard to maintain sight of the object. all 4 of us out there observed the object moving in a relative southeasterly direction (from the northwest), almost directly overhead of us in a straight path. as it continued on its path, one of my friends said "try to communicate with it" so i put my intention on that. at this point, the object seemed almost to slow down a bit (this was just before it was about to go out of sight), but did not ever stop moving as best we could tell. my heart eventually started racing as we did not know what we were looking at, and since the speed appeared to be diminishing we were hoping that it would remain in view for a little bit longer. we also thought that it might have been comet elenin since that is supposed to make its closest path to the earth on this date, but we didn't think it was supposed to be so bright or appear in the area of the sky that it did. eventually after slowing down and almost coming to a stop, after about 40-50 seconds, the object disappeared behind the tree line at about 30-40��� above the horizon (south or southeast direction) and we lost sight of it. we have no real way to determine the relative altitude of the object. after the sighting we were discussing what it could possibly be, and we seemed to agree that it didn't really look like a plane or a satellite or comet.
content.summary: Red/orange light passed overhead, emitted no sound, approached the horizon, appeared to slow down, then sight lost

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on pearl street around midnight and off to my right i noticed the object hovering above the power lines and transformers. i pulled over and went into the gas station parking lot directly across the street from the craft. the gas station was closed. the distance was maybe 50 feet away. i stood there and watched it for several minutes just hovering stationary above the facility. it then kind of slowly hovered over to pearl street and started heading west following the  path of the street. i jumped into my car and followed it down pearl street when it then took a left turn and headed down another street. i followed it but on this coarse it started to accelerate and then headed over the puget sound> i am not sure but i think it went into the water. i called the police and the dispatcher asked me if i would make a report with an officer. she said they had other calls but no one would make the report. i agreed and met with the officers at a convenience store parking lot. they pretty much laughed and made fun of me but took the report. sorry but this was a long time ago but it is has been an event that i think about often.
content.summary: I watched it hover over a corner that had a bunch of power transformers

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving south on i-435 approaching i-70 in kansas city when i saw three triangular  shaped air craft. i thought at first it was three small planes with white lights that were doing a fly over at the kc chiefs stadium. i saw them on two different nights on the way home from work in the same location. they flew very close to each other and were flying fairly erratically and within a circumference of about five miles.  they would double back around for an additional fly over in the general area of the stadiums. i have been a solo pilot for many years and thought that the maneuvers they were doing were very risky.   i didn't say anything to anyone about this and i was alone. since i was driving on the hi way i couldn't stop but i really wanted to.
   this morning in church our pastor said something about the unusual lights in the sky earlier this month and it dawned on me that i saw these lights too!
content.summary: I was driving south on 435 approaching i-70 when i saw three triangular objects

content.detailedDescription:
Last thursday, 5:30 a.M. until 5:45 a.M. i was looking at (m42) the orion nebula when 1 light moved across my view. i thought to follow it. i viewed it for a couple of minutes moving from se to nw when 2 other lights started moving down my view from nw to se. they passed each other. when they did, about a minute later, the 1st object stopped. the other 2 moved for a couple more minutes, then they also stopped. i sat there for another 10 minutes just looking at those stopped lights and finally shut my scope down and went to bed.
last night, i was again looking at m42 when another light started moving again across my view. again, i followed it. it moved in the same direction as the 1st ones did on thursday 10/13/2011. the light caught up to 2 more lights that started moving with it. those 3 caught up to 2 more and they were all moving in the same direction, same speed, it seemed. then the 1st light started to turn back and then it went back to the spot where i 1st noticed it. it then stopped. i went back to see if i could pick up where the others were but they either stopped and just looked like stars or were gone. i'm not sure what happened to them. i went back to light #1 and looked at it for 10 minutes or so and just shut down my scope. it never moved again. i'm going to go buy a video camera for my scope and hopefully i can capyure these lights again for your viewing.
content.summary: 5 lights/objects flew across my view in telescope

content.detailedDescription:
Oct 3rd 2011, ufo sighting lees summit, mo, usa 


this was a busy moving week for us, and we had just gotten up to independence to pick up a cool bunk bed for our son and was driving back to lee's summit via 291 hwy south.  my wife was driving the u-haul 14ft truck and i was on the passenger side.  somewhere on 291 hwy just passed woods chapel (around 8pm-ish), i saw thru the front left corner of the windshield what i thought were lights on top of a building.  as i realized there were no buildings there i then thought it was a billboard with a series of lights on it as the lights were just hovering there motionless (it was a pretty dark and on-coming traffic headlights made it hard to see eye level detail).  these lights i would say were around 100 ft off the ground and they looked like a christmas tree lighted up [with white/amber lights] lying on its side with the "tip" of the tree pointing in the south direction.  

as soon as i realized something was odd about the lights i quickly pointed them out to my wife.  as we got closer to the lights another object caught my attention, it was hovering at the same level as the first set of lights and about 100 ft south of it. this second object, i thought was a helicopter and got the impression that it was checking out the first object (either police or news crew helicopter. it too was odd looking as it had red and blue (and green?) blinking lights in an angular pattern outlining it and i don���t think it was a helicopter as it was a dark object hovering motionless with no tilt or wobble you see on a helicopter trying to hover in one spot. at the same time i was trying to start up the camera on my phone.  although i managed to video a little just as we passed it, the movement and low lighting made it impossible to distinguish anything.  regretting not having my regular digital camera with me, my senses were at a heightened state after seeing such odd objects in an odd setting (odd objects hovering in plain sight next to a highway with heavy traffic). 


we continued on south on 291 hwy. after a couple of minutes, the first object, being brightly lit against a dark sky, again caught my attention.  this time it was out my passenger side window, the rapid motion and lights from it got my attention as it flew fluidly (at about the same altitude) from a north to south direction. i watched it for a second or two and it separated into 3 separate objects; one set of lights continued to fly forward while two other sets of lights immediately turned on a dime and went the opposite direction (north). the one set of lights closest to me tilted slightly to the west as it made the turn allowing me to see the underside. it had 3 lights forming a triangle. none of these 3 objects had blinking lights at anytime, only the constant white amber lights. in retrospect we should have stopped to observe more but we had people waiting at the house to help us with our move so we continued on home. unexpectedly, we saw the same object[s]/lights again the next day on the 4th of october! i will file that in another separate report.
content.summary: Strange object splits into three parts and another object appears to watch it

content.detailedDescription:
I bought a camera and was testing it out when i took these 3 photos and at the time i did not see anything with the naked eye! i live in ny and after 9/11 im very aware of what is in the sky. i saw no planes or copters or blimps or lights while taking these pictures. i did no use a flash and was just randomly shooting pictures and got 3 in a row of what appears to be a ball of light or reflecting light. the third pic is the actually shape of the object. 

i also had an encounter upstate i would like to include in the next submission.
content.summary: Did not see it till after i took the pictures without a flash! then i noticed the ball of light and what looks like a blimp with no lights on.

content.detailedDescription:
Came back  to(link moved to fi box) cms 10/16/11 21:52 cst flgand once again i saw the red lights over south mountain in phoenix az its a wonder there is no reports of it...Cept mine.
tonight there was an added feature a misty orb again like last night but very slow according to the 15 minutes photos of the area. 
also the site mysteriously does not keep an archive of these lights very strange.. but i got my copies!!!(link moved to fi box) cms 10/16/11 21:52 cst flg
content.summary: Orbs making a rectangle shape with orb occassionally over it

content.detailedDescription: Was going to bed, it was about 11.45pm. i was looking out of the bedroom window( we have a very good view over the moors),it was a very clear night, i could see some lights in the distance, i thought at first it was a plane coming in to bristol airport, as we`re close to the flight path that they sometimes use. but these lights were slightly off the usual path & as i was looking, the light seemed to split in to two (one above the other),so i watched it coming towards us(my wife was there, she observed also). the light was really bright, it seemed there was a lot of glare coming from the window, so i opened them wide, but the glare was still there...From about a mile out, it looked like it could possibly two large aircraft with their headlights on, at this time i could make out flashing lights(like landing lights) so i was still sure it was a plane or possibly helicopters from the nearby naval air base, but, i still had to watch to be sure. it moved very slowly, but it`s path was bringing almost directly over our house, as it came closer i could see it was not 2 sets of headlights, it`s a bit hard to explain, the main light was, a straight line(like a strip light), with 2 more shorter ones going off at roughly 45 degree angles from the bottom. there were about 6-8 flashing landing lights around the main light, as it flew over the house, i put my head right out the window & looked up, all the lights were on the front of it, as it passed it looked flat, i could see the lights pass & make out, like,the start of a cube, but did not see anything after the lights had passed my field of vision. after it had passed then i heard sound, it was a quiet noise, a bit like the sound of an commercial airplane, of which i`ve heard a hundred times before, in the night. after it was gone i asked my wife at least twice "did you see that?", "yes".We didn`t speak for about 5 minutes, it was like wow!!, did that really just happen?
content.summary: Very slow moving , the lights were very strange.

content.detailedDescription: We (my daughter and i) noticed ppl pulling over outside our street and they shouted 4 us 2 look outside. ne in the sky about 11:45 pm we saw a couple thousands lights that were blue, purple, white, and red. they were clustered then formed into a line then disappeared. we live in abq, nm. did this happened to anyone else? i was so amazed i contacted the news. alot of ppl were pulling over and attempting to take photos, etc of this
content.summary: Abq: we noticed ppl pulling over outside our street and  ne in the sky about 11:45 pm we saw a couple thousands lights ...

content.detailedDescription:
On a very still, unseasonably warm spring night sometime between 11:30 and 12 midnight i heard the sound of what sounded like large trees being toppled at a slow, constant speed. the sound was coming from our neighbors woods which is 800 feet down from our property and was heading our way as it was getting louder and louder, we live in a heavily wooded area in southern brown county and have enourmous trees just for the record. 
i woke my husband from a sound sleep and made him come over to the window and explained to him i had been listening to the noise for a while now. he was groggy and said he didn't know what it was and told me he was going back to sleep. the noise continued across our property and continued until i could no longer hear it. the next afternoon a conservation officer stopped by and asked if we had experienced anything strange the night before and before i could say anything my husband said, "i've been a woodsman my entire life and last night i heard something i have no explaination for", then proceeded to describe what he had heard. the officer said that there were several hundred sightings of a cigar shaped craft hovering over a church camp and a good friend later told us he was at a party in nashville, indiana, which is about 10 miles east of us also in brown county, and saw it hovering while out on the deck. after hearing what others had seen i then realized that what had happened in our woods was actually the tops of trees being sheared off, and i'm talking large limbs! i could not see the craft as i was inside my house looking into pitch darkness and there was no light coming from the craft.That same night a teenage girl driving home from a church meeting almost wrecked her car when a large creature on two legs leaped across the road only touching pavement once. this happened not 7 miles from our house. my husband worked with her father. this is a second hand account which i cannot confirm as i didn't personally witness it but according to my husband the man was certainly not one to make up a story like that. i was told about this site by dan aykroyd and promised to record my account.
content.summary: I heard the sound of large trees being sheared of their tops at a slow, constant speed with no noise from a motor on an otherwise still night. the next day there were reports of a cigar shaped object hovering over a campground at the end of our road .

content.detailedDescription: On this early morning drive we noticed a particular cloud formation not usually seen, and we were in awe of the big circular formation cloud in the lower right hand of the picture. (it looked more beautiful than the picture shows)... i asked my front seat passenger to take pictures of the cloud as i was driving (she focused on the circular formation cloud on the lower right side of the picture). when i downloaded all of my pictures today from my camera to my laptop and casually looked through them, i am uncertain as to just what was to the right of a plane captured in the left hand side of the picture? this object is not in the other pictures she took so it can not be from the window... i have the other pictures if you want to see them... just wanted to share and see if anyone else wanted to take a more in depth look...
content.summary: Taking pictures of just clouds and did not see this unknown object flying near plane until downloaded to computer.

content.detailedDescription: Saw a giant triangle shaped craft with about 5 or 6 lights in a giant triangle shape at or around 8 pm.  slient except for helicopter trailing behind.    object apeared to be very large.  bigger than a normal blimp or bigger than anything i have ever seen in the sky.   drove to try and follow it but lights dissapeared.   called 911 and reported weird lights in the sky and the said they have had another call about the same thing that night.   it was weird.
content.summary: Seen a giant triangle shaped object followed by airplane and helicopter
